detaileddescription.para: Speed unit conversion: 0.1 km/h to 0.01 km/h scale.

Used in any function.
values 10u
Used for timer of 100ms resolution.

Used in: doBackupReactionForHMS_ESC handleSRangieren handleEPBStatusIsClosedTimer handleVerzoegerungTimer handleHMSTimer VLK_RollAway_Protection_Init
values 10u
Used for timer of 1000ms resolution.

Used in: handleFahrstufeTimer VLK_RollAway_Protection_Init VLK_RollAway_Protection_Process
values 100u
Fault value for vehicle speed.

Used in any function.
values 65535u
Used to indicate Getriebe_11 timeout.

Used in getCorrectedTimeout function.
values 64u
Delay timers for ACAN. 1u = 10ms -> 500ms delay.

Used in getCorrectedTimeout and VLK_RollAway_Protection_Init function.
values 50u
Used for timer of 500ms.

Used in handleEPBTimer function
values 50u

Minimum delay until Maneuvering (rangieren) mode is active. Its maximum value is 200ms. Used in: handleSRangieren getEPBLockStatus VLK_RollAway_Protection_Init
range: [0,65535] unit: N/A resolution: N/A context: task protection: none storage class: normal ram

Used to indicate maintained parking status. Used in: handleMaintainedParking VLK_RollAway_Protection_Init VLK_RollAway_Protection_Process
range: [0,3] unit: N/A resolution: N/A context: task protection: none storage class: normal ram

Used to store last gear position. Used in: handleSRangieren VLK_RollAway_Protection_Init VLK_RollAway_Protection_Process
range: [0,15] unit: N/A resolution: N/A context: task protection: none storage class: normal ram

Flag used to indicate maneuvering mode status. 1: active 0: stopped Used in: handleSRangieren VLK_RollAway_Protection_Init
range: [0,1] unit: N/A resolution: N/A context: task protection: none storage class: normal ram

Flag used to store if gear position is set. Used in: handleFahrstufeTimer getEPBLockStatus
range: [0,1] unit: N/A resolution: N/A context: task protection: none storage class: normal ram

Timer for cancelling the trigger of EPB lock. Its maximum value is 100ms. Used in: handleEPBStatusIsClosedTimer getEPBLockStatus handleEPBStatusIsClosedTimer VLK_RollAway_Protection_Init
range: [0,255] unit: N/A resolution: N/A context: task protection: none storage class: normal ram

Timer to show message no driver detected. Its maximum value is 6s. Used in: VLK_RollAway_Protection_Init VLK_RollAway_Protection_Process
range: [0,65535] unit: N/A resolution: N/A context: task protection: none storage class: normal ram

Delay until reaction while HMS failure state. Its maximum value is 1s. Used in: doBackupReactionForHMS_ESC VLK_RollAway_Protection_Init
range: [0,65535] unit: N/A resolution: N/A context: task protection: none storage class: normal ram

Time when a gear position is maintained. Its maximum value is 1s. Used in: handleFahrstufeTimer getEPBLockStatus VLK_RollAway_Protection_Init
range: [0,255] unit: N/A resolution: N/A context: task protection: none storage class: normal ram

Delay until reaction of failure state for input signal of rolling away protection. Its maximum value is 2s. Used in: handleVerzoegerungTimer VLK_RollAway_Protection_Init
range: [0,65535] unit: N/A resolution: N/A context: task protection: none storage class: normal ram

Timeout time of Getriebe_11 CAN message. Its maximum value is 500ms. Used in: getCorrectedTimeout VLK_RollAway_Protection_Init
range: [0,255] unit: N/A resolution: N/A context: task protection: none storage class: normal ram
Function used to handle the external lock request process.

Conditions for lock request are checked and in case they are fulfilled the external lock request will be activated.

Function for setting driver notification (degradated vlw) for the case of error.

Conditions for driver notification (degradated vlw) for the case of error are checked. If at least one of the three blocks are fulfilled, output will be degradated.
